wiki.summary: “Need Me” describes an unhealthy relationship marked by infidelity and lies, however, neither of the two accepts the state of their romance and continue their bad habits instead of ending the relationship. Their love is addictive despite the experiences they have had, something that is emphasized in the hook: “Maybe you need me”. Em has brought up similar themes on “Tragic Endings” and “Love the Way You Lie.” The two already collaborated on Eminem’s album "Recovery" in “Won’t Back Down” Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “Need Me” describes an unhealthy relationship marked by infidelity and lies, however, neither of the two accepts the state of their romance and continue their bad habits instead of ending the relationship. Their love is addictive despite the experiences they have had, something that is emphasized in the hook: “Maybe you need me”. Em has brought up similar themes on “Tragic Endings” and “Love the Way You Lie.” The two already collaborated on Eminem’s album "Recovery" in “Won’t Back Down”, and more recently on P!nk’s “Revenge.”. They also collaborated on P!nk’s album "The Truth About Love", on the track “Here Comes the Weekend”. Grey posted a photo on her Instagram story, in which she detailed her helping hand on four songs, including “Need Me.” Read more on Last.fm.
